Human Resources information to maintain employment relationship.
EWT hereby acknowledges and declares its commitment to cooperate with the EU authority or authorities as set forth in FAQ 5 (The Role of the Data Protection Authorities) and FAQ 9 (Human Resources) relating to the transfer of personal information from the EU for use in the context of the employment relationship, to a parent, affiliate, or unaffiliated service provider in the U.S. participating in the Program.
